welcome_message: Welcome to the Secret Letter application!
homepage_card_1_description: Send unspoken words to the person who suits your mood.
homepage_card_2_description: Feel free to share your feelings without fear of judgment.
homepage_card_3_description: Find and connect with people who share similar emotions.
hero_badge: A place to share feelings anonymously
hero_title_3: to the Soul at the Right Time
hero_description_2: Connecting you with like-minded people, where every emotion is heard and understood
section_description: The system will automatically connect you with people who have the same emotional state
feature_section_description: A unique platform to help you share your emotions safely and meaningfully
cta_description: Thousands of people are waiting to connect with you
footer_description: Where unspoken words are sent, where moods are shared anonymously.
happy_mood_example_1: Hi there, today I feel really happy and want to share this positive energy with you. Hope you have an amazing day too!
